# Tech Stack Template

> Copy to `docs/tech/techstack.md` to keep the runtime environment and dependencies transparent.

- **Primary language(s):**
- **Frameworks / libraries:** (include versions and key plugins)
- **Build tooling:** (compilers, bundlers, task runners)
- **Testing stack:** (unit/integration/e2e frameworks, coverage tools)
- **CI/CD:** (platform, pipeline summary, key scripts)
- **Infrastructure / hosting:** (cloud providers, container orchestrators, serverless, etc.)
- **Data stores:** (databases, caches, message brokers)
- **Observability / ops:** (metrics, logging, tracing, alerting, feature flags)
- **Local dev environment:** (package managers, required services, environment variables, setup scripts)
- **Security / compliance notes:** (threat model callouts, secrets management, audits)

> Update this file whenever the stack changes materially, linking to the ADR or spec that introduced the shift.
